from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()



[docs]
class ApplicationConfig:
    SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS = False
    SQLALCHEMY_ECHO = False
    SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = r"sqlite:///./db.db"
    ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET=os.environ["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"]
    REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET=os.environ["REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET"]
    SECRET_KEY=os.environ["SECRET_KEY"]
    REFRESH_TOKEN_TIMER=15
    ACCESS_TOKEN_TIMER=5
    SOLR_URL=r"http://smash1.inf.ed.ac.uk"
    SOLR_PORT=10196
    SOLR_CORES=["covid_anonymised", "fifa_anonymised"]
